poker

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      The Deck constructor produces the 52-card deck, with cards in ascending order (Ace high).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card dealOneCard()
      Returns a Card from the top of the deck, there are any cards in the deck.
      int getCardCount()
      Getter method for the size of deck.
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCardList()
      Getter method for the card list in the deck.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method to test Deck class and associated methods.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles all cards in the deck and distributes them randomly throughout the deck.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        The Deck constructor produces the 52-card deck, with cards in ascending order (Ace high).

    • Method Detail

      • getCardList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCardList()
        Getter method for the card list in the deck.
        Returns:
        list of cards in deck

      • getCardCount

        public int getCardCount()
        Getter method for the size of deck.
        Returns:
        number of cards in deck

      • dealOneCard

        public Card dealOneCard()
        Returns a Card from the top of the deck, there are any cards in the deck. Top of the deck is defined as the first card in the list of current cards in the deck.
        Returns:
        Card at the top of the deck, or null if cards have already been dealt.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles all cards in the deck and distributes them randomly throughout the deck. Shuffles each card by generating a random number between 1 and the size of the deck, and inserting the card at that position in the deck.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to test Deck class and associated methods. Ability to shuffle, deal one card, deal all cards, and reset the deck
        Parameters:
        args - takes in commands from console to test methods
